Package: sk.hax.software.os

[Groovy] Class Datagram

    • sk.hax.software.os.Datagram

    • Represents a piece of data to be sent over the network. Contains the destination address and port, as well as the data in the form of a byte array.

      Authors:
      mio

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          int  address
          Source/destination network address.
          byte[]  data
          Payload of the datagram.
          int  port
          Source/destination port number.

          Construct an empty datagram.

          Construct a copy of another datagram.
